Articles.Title: Dr Hans Zarkov Dies Aged 87
Articles.Description: Actor Chaim Topol (aka "Topol"), who played Dr Hans Zarkov in the 1980 movie, Flash Gordon, has died at age 87. He was best known for the role of Tevye in Fiddler on the Roof, a role he performed over 3500 times.Thanks, Hans, for helping save the universe.

Articles.Title: Chaim Topol, Israeli actor famous for portraying Tevye in 'Fiddler on the Roof,' dies at 87
Articles.Description: From his 30s onward, Topol played "Tevye" over 3,500 times on stage. He had already been doing the part for years when he landed the movie role.
Articles.Content: Chaim Topol, a leading Israeli actor who charmed generations of theatergoers and movie-watchers with his portrayal of Tevye, the long-suffering and charismatic milkman in Fiddler on the Roof, has die… [+4947 chars]
